recipesJson.name: Mint Slice
recipesJson.author: Brent1989
recipesJson.description:
Choc-mint slice, just like Grandma used to make.

I have been through a few versions of this flavour and still feel as though itâ€™s not quite finished.

This has a strong biscuit flavour, a rich chocolate note, and a lingering freshness from the mint. The creaminess tends to get lost a bit behind the biscuit, but Iâ€™ve used it to try to tie all of the flavours together.
